p: Similarly, we analyse repeated settlement of a site in broader temporal entities. If a Solutrean site is reoccupied in the Magdalenian, it may represent enduring continuity in the role that site played in the overall land use pattern. If sites are not reoccupied in the later techno-complex, it could reflect changes in resource availability (due to environmental changes or to changes in the resource selection), changes in mobility or the complete abandonment of a (micro-)region.
